sub_title: Senior Engineering Manager - 5G Architecture and MEC at Singtel
summary:
Technically savvy, results-driven and goal-focused professional with years of experience, abilities and skill as a technical leader, senior software engineer and senior java developer. Proven ability to understand and analyze project requirements and translate them into specifications and program deliverables. Effectively able to research, design, and write new software programs and execute full lifecycle software development. Hands-on experience in tailoring and deploying software tools and metrics according to specified requirements.   

•	Excellent communication, interpersonal and presentation skills
•	Strong team building and leadership qualities.
•	Superior abilities in handling unpleasant and stressful situations
•	Complex problem solving 
•	Quality Management

school.name: Institute of Java and Technological Studies

projects.title: Singtel Enterprise Business (SEB) Platform
projects.description: A Singtel Enterprise Business Platform is a comprehensive suite of software tools and services designed to enable Singtel to deliver a range of business services to its enterprise customers. This platform typically includes a range of services, such as voice and data communications, messaging, collaboration tools, cloud services, and other applications that are critical to businesses. A SEB Platform provides businesses with the ability to connect and communicate with Enterprise customers, partners, and employees using a single, integrated solution. This platform can also help businesses to improve productivity and efficiency, reduce costs, and increase revenue by enabling them to offer new and innovative services to their customers.

contributors.headline: Senior Engineering Manager - 5G Architecture and MEC at Singtel

projects.title: 5G Enterprise Platform - Singtel
projects.description: 5G is a totally new technology and all enterprises and telcos are constantly learning how 5G will work, the benefits that 5G will bring to enterprises, the threats in a 5G network, and best practices. Also, 5G is much more software-defined compared to typical telco networks. Coming from a software development background, it is critical to understand the domain aspects of 5G, how it works, and the ways to interact with the 5G network and control/operate the 5G network in order to build software tools and platforms to operationalize 5G for customers. Having said that, definitely feeling proud to be part of the team to develop a software platform for 5G.

projects.title: Singtel’s hybrid Multi-Access Edge Compute (MEC)
projects.description: To achieve high compatibility with as many business critical applications as possible, Singtel has built a hybrid MEC - offering Singtel’s own edge computing solution along with hyper scalar solutions from Amazon Web Services Outpost and Microsoft Azure. This means availability of a wide range of ready-to-use, plug-and-play services at the edge to help enterprises rapidly develop and deploy their novel solutions. Additionally, the hybrid MEC is available now on both 4G and 5G network, enabling immediate enterprise trials and commercial deployments in 4G with migration to 5G when the network is available throughout the country. To complete the offering, Singtel also offers on-premise private MEC for enterprises.

contributors.headline: Senior Engineering Manager - 5G Architecture and MEC at Singtel

projects.title: DROPS Inspection Client Application
projects.description:
This is a java application for  DROPS Inspection Module surveys being conducted in oil rigs.  The application is designed to install on different devices such as tablet and tough book. The app allows to store data during the surveys and synchronizes with a web system. This way it enables users to manage survey data efficiently by allowing to download and upload data via Web system. A solution that allows offshore resources (with no Internet access) to collect and save data, and then upload the locally-stored data to a central web-server database when internet access is available at a later time.

-Technologies used:

Java Swing Platform
Hibernate
Apache Derby
Jasper Reporting

projects.title: Internet Banking, Mobile Banking Implementation - Seylan Bank
projects.description:
Facilitate online banking users with fund transfers, utility payments, balance inquiries, E Statements and other financial needs. 
USSD technology is ideally suited for Micro Banking customers and non-Smart phone users. USSD technology is embraced by millions of mobile phone customers worldwide.Easily navigable menu system will guide bank customers to the necessary transactions with ease and convenience. Under a single open session, customers can do any number of transactions at minimum costs to the financial institute. 
CEFT allows customers to perform real time debit and credit transactions between different banks.

profile_positions.description:
•	Led and managed the software engineering team, providing guidance and direction to ensure the team was working towards the company's objectives and goals.
•	Build and develop a high-performing software engineering team, including hiring, mentoring, and coaching team members. You are responsible for building an environment that fosters collaboration, creativity, and innovation.
•	Planning and executing software engineering projects, which includes defining project scope, timelines, and budgets. Work closely with other stakeholders, such as Product Managers, to ensure that projects are delivered on time, within budget, and to the required level of quality.
•	Possess strong technical expertise in software engineering. This includes a deep understanding of software development methodologies, tools, and technologies, analyzing technologies and applications to identify weaknesses and develop improvements to capacity, availability, and efficiency.
•	Practicing Agile methodologies and delivering the components on time.
•	Design solution architectures for customer apps/workloads and facilitate trial deployments of the 5G apps on the telco edge cloud 
•	Lead selection of technology components across the infrastructure stack of the telco edge cloud 
•	Design deployment of SAAS and PAAS workloads on the telco edge cloud 
•	Contribute technical and thought leadership to SingTel’s 5G platform initiative, and how to leverage IoT and big data management, Security/privacy, and AI/ML components into the platform architecture. 
•	Evangelize the platform and telco edge cloud infrastructure for use by other business units within SingTel and group companies and lead the solution design for these applications to effectively use the platform. 
•	Interact with implementation partners and customers to understand their needs and feed this back to the development teams and roadmap. 
•	Participate in technical partnership conversations and due diligence.
